about_the_game:
【SUMMARY】
The protagonist of this story “Shuko Tachibana” saw the “Evil Eye” and was cursed with a lewd crest since she was young.
After many years of training, Shuko mastered the art of magic and head towards subjugating the Evil Eye to break its curse.
However, that “Evil Eye” was in fact a mutated breed and had grown more powerful and cunning over time.
The king of lewd curses and brainwashing now has an army of monsters at his disposal.



【VERGE OF DEATH & STATUS AILMENTS】
Each status effect can change the sprite.
Also, when on the verge of death or affected by a status ailment,
Her familiar will vanish and she won’t be able to use long ranged attacks,
On top of that, her status and actions will also be restricted.

【DEFEAT PIXEL ANIMATION & CG】
What will become of Shuko after was defeated by the monsters...
Each defeated ending comes with CG.



【GAME OVERVIEW】
An orthodox side-scrolling action game.
Advance through the stages while defeating oncoming enemies.

When your HP drops to zero and certain enemies approach you, defeat animation will be played.
While viewing it, you can move your camera around.
*Gamepad/controller recommended.

【CONTROLS】
◆Action mode
Move: ← or →
Dash: Shift while moving
Back dash: W
*Mana consumption: Small
Jump: Space
Double jump: Space while jumping
*Mana consumption: Small
Melee attack: Z
*Chain up to 3 times
Dash attack: Z while dashing
*Mana consumption: Medium
Invincible counter: Z while back dashing
*Mana consumption: Medium
Ranged attack: X
*Mana consumption: Small
Charged Shot: Hold X and release when fully charged
*Mana consumption: Large
Examine: Up
*For save points etc
Zoom out/in: Q to toggle while in standby state
----------------------------------------------------------------
◆Viewing mode
Camera Movements: ← or → or ↑or ↓
Zoom in: Shift
Zoom out: Ctrl
Toggle animation: Z
View CG: X
END: Space
Restart: F2
*Usable anytime in viewing mode
*"Recollections" on Title screen will be accessible after clearing the game
----------------------------------------------------------------
◆System
View/hide settings: F1
*Including key config
Return to title: F5
Fullscreen toggle: F10

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Sexual scenes, Bestiality, Torture.

It also contain non-consensual sex.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

【SUMMARY】
The protagonist of this story “Shuko Tachibana” saw the “Evil Eye” and was cursed with a lewd crest since she was young.
After many years of training, Shuko mastered the art of magic and head towards subjugating the Evil Eye to break its curse.
However, that “Evil Eye” was in fact a mutated breed and had grown more powerful and cunning over time.
The king of lewd curses and brainwashing now has an army of monsters at his disposal.

Each status effect can change the sprite.
Also, when on the verge of death or affected by a status ailment,
Her familiar will vanish and she won’t be able to use long ranged attacks,
On top of that, her status and actions will also be restricted.

name: Dominating eyes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: “Shuko Tachibana” saw the “Evil Eye” and was cursed with a lewd crest since she was young. She trained to become a magician to subjugate the Evil Eye and break its curse. However, that Evil Eye has become the king of lewd curses and brainwashing and now has an army of monsters at his disposal.
